metadata.name: Pieter de Graaf - "Home" Vinyl
metadata.description: This NFT is the confirmation for the purchase of the limited edition vinyl "Home" by Pieter de Graaf. This record also describes Pieter de Graaf's first NFT project. It grants you exclusive access to the artist himself through various avenues. Even in unique draws, only the holder of the NFT can participate. There is no way to get any closer to Pieter de Graaf.
